original_text: But I want you to understand that the head of every man is Christ, the head of a wife is her husband, and the head of Christ is God.
korean_text: 그러나 나는 너희가 알기를 원하노니 각 남자의 머리는 그리스도요 여자의 머리는 남자요 그리스도의 머리는 하나님이시라

sentences.original_text: But I want you to understand
that the head of every man is Christ
the head of a wife is her husband
and the head of Christ is God.
